title: Optimal Upload Time Detected
message: Your videos posted on Tuesday and Thursday at 2 PM get 35% more engagement than other times. Consider scheduling your next upload then.

title: Growing International Audience
message: 60% of your new subscribers this month are from India and UK. Consider creating content that resonates with these demographics.

title: Trending Topic Opportunity
message: The topic 'AI productivity tools' is trending in your niche with 2.5M+ searches. You haven't covered this yet - high opportunity for growth!

title: Thumbnail Improvement Needed
message: Videos with custom thumbnails featuring faces get 3x more clicks. Only 40% of your recent videos use this strategy.

title: Ideal Video Length
message: Your best-performing videos are between 8-12 minutes long. Videos outside this range have 25% lower watch time.

title: Community Engagement
message: Videos where you respond to comments in the first hour get 45% more engagement. Try engaging more actively after uploads.

title: SEO Improvement
message: Adding timestamps to your descriptions could increase search visibility by 30%. Only 3 of your last 10 videos have them.

title: Content Format Suggestion
message: Tutorial-style content in your niche gets 50% more shares than other formats. Consider creating more step-by-step guides.
